channel.title: Music – Alter Bridge
channel.description: Recent content in Alter Bridge on Music

item.title: Alter Bridge - Metalingus
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 60333

I’ve been defeated
and brought down ah
Dropped to my knees
when hope ran out ah
The time has come
to change my ways
On this day
I see clearly
Everything has
come to life
A bitter place and
a broken dream
And we’ll leave it all
leave it all behind

I’ll never
long for
What might
have been ah
Regret won’t waste
my life again ah
I won’t look back
I’ll fight to remain
On this day
I see clearly
Everything has
come to life
A bitter place and
a broken dream
And we’ll leave
it all behind
On this day
it’s so real to me
Everything has
come to life
Another chance
to chase a dream
Another chance to feel
chance to feel alive

Fear will kill me
all I could be
Lift these
sorrows
Let me breathe could
you set me free
Could you
set me free
On this day
I see clearly
Everything has
come to life
A bitter place and
a broken dream
And we’ll leave
it all behind
On this day
it’s so real to me
Everything has
come to life
Another chance
to chase a dream
Another chance to feel
chance to feel alive
